extendedInfo.description: Nearest Post Office is the only app in the Android Market which helps you find the nearest Post Office from your actual location.With 12,000 Post Offices, there's bound to be one near you, but do you know its position? Your nearest Post Office is just a tap away! Track the office down, view it on a map or get the directions to reach it whether you are on foot or in a car.Not satisfied with the nearest Post Office? Don't worry! You can always find out the top 10 nearest ones.See addresses, opening hours and 24h ATM service availability. Search according to zip code, address, city or area to find the Post Offices across UK. Use this app in landscape or portrait mode.For any help, please visit "About" section in the app.This service is available in: London, Birmingham, Leeds, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Cardiff, Oxford, Cambridge and all other cities/towns reached by Post Office service.For a list of available postcode areas, please visit Help page from "About" section.Feel free to send post office suggestions to the developer right from within the app.This app is not officially endorsed or supported by Post Office Ltd.Post office locations may be inaccurate or wrong, so no responsibility for any loss, damage or injury arising from the use of this service will be taken.

reviews.title: Terrible rubbish crap
reviews.comment: This thing is so pathetic it was over 39 miles out and wouldn\'t recognise any postcodes when doing a manual search total crapp .... John G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: 20 yards from my local post office but this app sent me to one 9 miles away. I can think of half a dozen nearer!!! Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Glyn Davies

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works fine for me, does exactly what it says on the tin.
reviews.author: A Google User
